page.title: 19Typical week's news, Swindon
page.content:
{Demonstraters }picket Barclays Bank in the town centre to protest about the bank's involvement with South Africa.
{High winds}brought down trees and blew a car off the motorway.
{Summer camp}at West Swindon has given hundreds of children a fun-packed programme of badminton, painting, swimming, gymnastics and skating.
{Mrs Mackie}has had her hair shaved off to raise Â£530 for Ethiopian famine victims.
{Many council houses}are crumbling away because of a chemical reaction between steel reinforcement and the cement.It could cost Â£1 million to solve the problem.
